p: Results of the pooled analyses for the risk of having been exposed to HCV are presented in Table 2. For PWID, the risk ranged between 25.0% in Lebanon and 94.2% in Libya, with a median of 52.6%. For countries with a generalized epidemic, it was 54.2%, and for those with a concentrated epidemic, it was 48.1%. For the MENA region as a whole, it was 49.1%.
